forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning. Partial clearing in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow tapering off in the morning. Decreasing cloudiness in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 38F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 27F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
